p: DCEO was prepared using the following procedure: air-dried herbs of Dingchuan tang (1,002 g) were soaked in 10 times of water (weight of herbs/volume of water is 1:10) overnight and then extracted by conventional steam distillation using the Clevenger-type apparatus for 5 hours. 24 After drying with sodium sulfate anhydrous, 400 μL of DCEO was obtained and then kept at 4°C in dark vials until use.
